question.question_html: Which of the following cannot be a buffer solution ?

last_reportee.description: The solution given is wrong I think. It is a colloidal solution.

question.question_html: Which of the following is not a planet ?

last_reportee.description: Answer should be D instead of A because both Pluto and Europa are not planets.
